creator: arthur.lutz@logilab.fr
text:
From what I understand of the documentation, the only way so far of runnning a job on a jmeter-server is to use the jmeter GUI or via some java code (RMI). It would be awesome to be able to access the jmeter-server via some HTTP calls. 

This would open up a great number of scenarios with the backing power of jmeter. 

If any projects like this exit, please point me in the right direction. If this could be directly in jmeter-server it would be great.
